name: A Fork in the Tale
storyline: The player controls Rob Schneider, an American comedian, who is lost in the land of Eseveron. Schneider navigates the world and encounters numerous characters who try to seduce him, help him, or kill him depending on interaction.
summary: Developed as a comedic take on the famous Dragon's Lair video game series by Advance Reality Interactive, A Fork in the Tale is an adventure FMV game.
